author: Tham Alfred
comment: Just bought this watch face, I love the design and the personalization settings sync with my watch instantly. One disappointment is the fitness info are not working, HR & steps always showing 0. I want to keep this app, can support help to fix the issues? I'm using Ticwatch S powered by Android Wear 2.0.

author: Tim Rice
comment: Just bought this I like it but why does the heart rate light on the back of my Huawei watch 2 stay on all the time??? Kills the battery!!?? If I take my watch off at night I have to turn it off?! Please sort it

author: John Ball
comment: My favourite watch face at the moment. One star knocked off because the heart rate monitor complication doesn't work (always displays 0) with Wear 2.0 (on a Huawei W1). And yes, I have tried reinstalling.

author: Titus McGrath
comment: Liked this so at first but now heart rate doesn't show up.  Reinstalled app a few times stil doesn't work.   I would love to give this app 5 stars but since fitness is a huge reason you would buy the app... and it doesn't seam to be working in rating it lower.

author: Peter Mortensen
comment: Good except the BPM doesn't work on LG G Watch. It gives me fake readings. I know this because the heart rate monitor does not come on and my table has a BPM of 56.

author: Mike Sorbo
comment: My favourite watchface, only issue is 0bpm on the heart rate reading. I am connected to Google fit and I want my readings to come from fit rather than the face as I don't want my sensor to be active all the time.
Automatic heart rate is not working anymore on LG Urbane 2. In fact no heart rate at all with this watch face. Sensor works under google fit...please fix this

author: James Boggust
comment: Great watchface. The best. Heart rate works perfectly on Huawei watch 2. However with Google fit enabled, heart rate stops working. Would be 5 star with HR on Google fit

author: Chris Frye
comment: Heart rate sensor doesn't work. Useless to me without it.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to disable fit and enable HR on your watch.

author: özgür turan
comment: Heart rate sensor is not working after android wear update 2.0. Please fix it. I already gave permissions.   Update: I reinstalled already, but no fix here. My watch is Huawei watch first version.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, try to reinstall the watch face

author: Peter Yabsley
comment: Great watch face, but let down by the Heart rate monitor and step counter not working when Google Fit installed.   I am using a new Huawei sport 2 watch  When I purchased there was an option for a refund and uninstall, 20 mins later I can't find out how to do this anywhere  Get the above sorted and this will be a fantastic Watch face and worth 5 stars

author: Gary MacDonald
comment: Would have been 5 stars  heart rate monitor doesn't work with huweai 2 watch.   If I disable Google fit it works but then I lose my fit data/foot count.   I shouldnt have to choose one or the other, I expect all data on a watch aimed at runners.

author: Nicolas D'Onofrio
comment: Heart rate and steps don't work on the watch face on my LG Watch Sport, and this is arguably the most important part of it. Google Fit and other watch faces have this data without issue, I've reinstalled and connected Google Fit on my phone. Please help!

author: Akber Butt
comment: Needs an update to resolve BPM issue which is not updating. Does consume allot of battery power. Very nice looking though.

author: Lee Adaway
comment: C R A P. The information is not available on the watch face. Steps say zero ect. I did try to reply to the developers comment. I'm using a Huawei watch 2 .

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Have you connected to google fit via companion app?

author: ABRAHAM KURIAKOSE
comment: Heart rate is not working after android 2.0 update on my moto360 gen2. It was working on the previous version. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling but no luck.

author: Tyler Evans
comment: I really like this interface on Huawei 2 but the BPM isn't working for me... If the bpm worked then this would be an easy 5 stars

author: Waylander
comment: One of my favorites. Nice big time numbers and you can easily read everything from a distance. Animated seconds ring with interactions for weather, calendar, stopwatch etc. Looks awesome on an AMOLED display of my Q Explorist.

author: Alistair Ross
comment: Doesn't work and can't get a refund! Steps data always 0, hr data always 0, looks terrible on square screen of polar m600

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please send us order number for refund.

author: Rob A
comment: Well it's nice looking but I bought it for the heart rate display. Oddly it's 61bpm just like the play store photo. Tested it and heart rate isn't working.

author: John Footen
comment: This watch face will not install on my Gear S2. I wasted money buying it. Disappointed!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please read description before buying. Send us Order Number and we will make refund.

author: Brad Moldenhauer
comment: Step counter doesn't update correctly main face on the LG Sport. Otherwise, excellent watch face

author: Jorge Cortes
comment: Couldn't get the heart rate to display nor the Google fit setting update button

author: Nick Preston
comment: Using on Huawei Watch 2. Overall a great, good looking, yet simple, watch face, but as with another reviewer deducting a star as the HR never displays anything other than 0.

author: Barrie Hobbs
comment: The heart rate monitor on Huawei watch doesn't work at all. I have tried install and reinstall connect g fit and disconnect g fit nothing works

author: Joshua Lewis
comment: Heart rate didn't work, Google Fit data was wrong... Refund needed

author: Chris Wallace
comment: Can either get step count to work with Google Fit, or the heart rate sensor to work without Google Fit activated. Will stick to a less attractive watch face that works right.

author: Mike Hillyard
comment: Love this face and very customisable. Had odd encounter with fit as would not connect but now seems OK, very odd so hoping issue all sorted.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you enabled a body sensor and location  permissions? To change a fit settings you have to be connected to fit, but strange thing is that you not able to connect it. Try to reinstall again. We can not reproduce your problem on our devices.

author: Dan Klamet
comment: Great, appealing design and tons of flexibility with the display.  Only issue is the heart rate monitor.  Using Moto 360 gen 2 and Android Wear 2.0
Great apps.  Does exactly what it says. I am using it on a LG urbane 2nd edition.

author: Rob Lowe
comment: Pretty good watch face, step counter doesn't properly sync with Google Fit, would rate higher otherwise.

author: Brandon Reed
comment: I keep wanting to use this but it's just not for me. I believe it does what it says but no so sure how accurate it is

author: Eric Decker
comment: Hr monitor doesn't work any more with wear 2.0!!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what kind of watch you have?

author: Graham Anderson
comment: Very attractive appearance. I've never got the HR display working and after the latest update the step count doesn't work either.

author: Tunde Adegboyo
comment: Not useful.. had to go back to previous face

author: Angela Torgerson
comment: Step count doesn't work, heart rate monitor isn't working... won't sync... only thing good about it is the color adjustability.

author: Thiago Medeiros
comment: Weather is not updating alone  It should be possible to change the steps on the watch face to something other, like calories...

author: Dino Švragulja
comment: The watch face looks really good, but unfortunately the heart rate display doesn't work and is constantly at zero

author: J KAY
comment: The step indicator don't work

author: Victor Shum
comment: Huawei Watch: heart rate monitor doesn't work, always displays 0
